pullRequest.title: [ Refactor ] Split TcpServerConnectionManager into itself and TcpServerConnectionManagerBase
pullRequest.bodyText:
Currently class has checkstyle suppression and almost at it's limit of fan-out complexity.
This PR splits this class into a base which handles private computation and it's former self which handles
the public API.
This is needed to add functionality into this class by #17428

nodes.bodyText: implements ServerConnectionManager is redundant here (the base class also implements this interface)

commit.message:
Refactor: extract TcpServerConnectionManagerBase class from TcpServerConnectionManager as to remove
fan-out complexity from this class

afterCommit.message:
Refactor: extract TcpServerConnectionManagerBase class from TcpServerConnectionManager as to remove
fan-out complexity from this class
